pages.title: Let's Move!
pages.body: Solve the epidemic of robot obesity by getting Tobor to move.

pages.title: Level 0: Let's Move!
pages.body: Let's start with getting Tobor to move through the maze to the goal.

pages.title: Instructions
pages.body:
Drag and drop the functions to complete the action
Hit 'Run' to see the function execute
View the code that makes it all come alive!

pages.title: Turning
pages.body: You can tell Tobor to turn left/right/up/down. Try using turning to get Tobor to the goal.

pages.title: Instructions
pages.body:
Drag and drop the functions to complete the action
Hit 'Run' to see the function execute
View the code that makes it all come alive!

pages.title: Welcome to I Tobor!
pages.body: Tobor's a super cool robot who sometimes forgets how to do things. Help him out with his controls by learning the basics of programming.

pages.title: Level 2: Functions
pages.body: Functions are self contained modules of code that accomplish a specific task. Functions usually take in data, process it, and return a result. Once a function is written, it can be used over and over and over again. Functions can be called from the inside of other functions.

pages.title: Instructions
pages.body:
Drag and drop the functions to complete the action
Hit 'Run' to see the function execute
View the code that makes it all come alive!
